title: can we do something about malphite?
body:
Why did he get buffed is one question i have in mind? Is it because he didn't win top lane hard enough? Nothing that's AD wins him, the only thing is maybe Nasus afk farming and sustaining poke and thats not even considered winning, just scaling and not dying. Having bonus 30 percent armor at all times tied in with attack speed reduction, MS slow, a shield, and high base damage as well as enhanced auto attacks means, i have no choice but to play rumble or maybe Vlad. Why and how is that fair exactly.

You give one option, go AP. How is that some sort of acceptable trait of his. He wrecks team fights completely and even if you do somehow outplay his E and suck up his Q damage and try to trade, his auto attacks deal more than yours in lane, no thanks to the new change.

It just doesn't seem logical?

replies.body: He has one gap closer. And its his ult. And its completely countered by flash or banshees veil. Just because something is good vs the champion you want to play, doesn't mean its OP
shhhhhhh dont tell riot, they'll nerf him.
I beat him as {{champion:150}}  90% of the time
what's their to do? he's fine as he is.

Lol I build hexdrinker as a first item against him, he deals no damage whatsoever then

After I get black cleaver and I win trades
yeah its not fair that you get to play vlad and run amuck if you're gold or below, or chogath, hint hint

It's the Meta of the tanks and Riot is just cementing that idea, we must play tanks and build tanky AND do all the damage.

It's a bit ridiculous the way this game has gone, with all the CC and all the tanks doing so much damage, you have no other choice at the moment.
Playing burst ad works too, specially if you can poke a little too to keep that shield down

he can break teamfights with his ult.

But if you miss it, rip.
